titleInfo.title: Moral Foundations and Perceptions of Rape in Colombia: Dataset Study 1

mods.abstract: This file contains the data of Study 1 reported in the paper "Moral Foundations and Perceptions of Rape in Colombia" by Laura Saldarriaga, Antonio Olivera-La Rosa, and Gerd Bohner
